title: ollama/ollama
summary: Ollama’s official CLI and server to pull, run, and manage GGUF models locally with a built-in Model-file DSL and REST API.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python library that wraps the Ollama REST API for chat, generate, pull, and embeddings endpoints.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers, exposing the same chat/generate/embed API surface.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain partner package adding Ollama LLM, embeddings, and tool-calling wrappers to the LangChain ecosystem.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Community-built ChatGPT-style web UI that connects to a local Ollama server; supports chat history, model switching, and file uploads.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based TUI client for Ollama with syntax highlighting, conversation persistence, and keyboard-centric workflow.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that routes GitHub Copilot chat requests to a local Ollama model instead of OpenAI.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin SDK for Ollama providing synchronous and asynchronous APIs, streaming, and embeddings support.

title: ollama-rs
summary: Rust crate that wraps the Ollama REST API with Tokio-based async calls and Serde model definitions.

title: ollama-chat
summary: Lightweight Flutter desktop app for chatting with Ollama models, built with llama.cpp bindings.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset allowing Ollama models to be used as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community-maintained Helm chart to deploy Ollama server and models on Kubernetes with GPU support.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker images (CPU and CUDA) plus docker-compose examples for running Ollama in containers.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Minimal Electron-based desktop GUI for Ollama to browse models and start/stop services.

title: ollama-nvidia-trt
summary: Experimental fork adding NVIDIA TensorRT-LLM backend for faster inference on RTX/Ada GPUs.

title: ollama-dify
summary: Dify open-source LLMOps platform integration that registers Ollama as a local model provider for chat and embeddings.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Template repo showing how to build a private RAG pipeline with Ollama embeddings, Chroma vector store, and LangChain.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that streams Ollama model responses into guild channels with slash commands and model switching.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community-maintained C# SDK for .NET 6+ with async HTTP client and System.Text.Json models.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat app template that proxies to Ollama, including session memory and model selector widgets.
